attributes.action: Stop uninsured & non taxed vehicles by scraping the compulsory 3rd party only insurance & the tax disc replacing them by raising fuel duty.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If a fixed tariff of approximately ten to fifteen pence per litre were added to fuel duty it would more than cover a basic 3rd party insurance policy and the cost of the tax disc for all motorists. This way everyone has to pay if they are driving a vehicle. It would also reduce all associated costs with respect to tax disc production & paperwork. Motorists could pay a reduced private premium to encompass fully comprehensive insurance if desired.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
